///

Stats functions written for the transcriptome project.

template<class RAIterator >
iterator_traits<RAIterator>::value_type percentile ( RAIterator  start,
RAIterator  stop,
double  percentage,
size_t  sampleSize = ULONG_MAX 
)

Return the value at a given percentile ///.

Parameters:
start beginning iterator ///
stop end iterator ///
percentage which precentile to return (0-100) ///
sampleSize (optional) size of sample to take from the input data. ///
Remarks:
This does not modify the input data. If the /// sampleSize is larger than the inputsize, all the input /// is used.
